content:
There was some talk about cloning modules relatively recently. I've done a basic port of Replicate UI and it seems to be working in a basic way (via a "Replicate" tab on nodes, terms, etc.) Anyone interested in testing please do!
https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/replicate_ui

backdrop-contrib/replicate_ui
Contribute to backdrop-contrib/replicate_ui development by creating an account on GitHub.

The module supports "Drupal actions" which I think means it's supposed to also provide dropdown actions and VBO (e.g. on the admin content listing page) and/or a "Replicate" link in the operations drop buttons, but those don't work (yet). I vaguely recall a conversation about Drupal actions being removed -- am I remembering that right?
But there is an API to do vbo type mass updates
@Laryn we still have hook_action_info() but those actions are usually triggered now by VBO, trigger module was moved to contrib.
@jenlampton Thanks, I will put this on my list to investigate at some point...
